QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Broken collarbone - aftercare
QAPair.Answer: The collarbone is a long, thin bone between your breastbone (sternum) and your shoulder. It is also called the clavicle. You have two collarbones, one on each side of your breastbone. They help to keep your shoulders in line. You have been diagnosed with a broken collarbone. Follow your health care provider's instructions on how to care for your broken bone.
